Name: Verdant Growth
Story Background: In the heart of the forest, nature's strength thrives and its guardians stand ready to protect it.
Ability: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. If it's a Treefolk creature, it gains trample until end of turn.
Appearance Description: A towering oak tree in the background, with green, glowing energy enveloping the creature in the foreground as roots burst from the ground around it.
